Mailing Address: c/o Administration OfficeBox 202221434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Service Details: - Provides help to families in need whose children may be at risk of being placed in the care of the Ministry of Children and Families Development- Specialized family support program provides intensive in home family support services and counseling to high need, high-risk families normally referred to the program from the Ministry of Children and Family Development (MCFD)- This service is flexible to the needs of the families in the community
How to Apply: Referrals are accepted only through the Ministry of Children and Family Development
